title: Edge Intelligence for 6G Networks
content: Developing AI-powered edge computing solutions for next-generation 6G wireless networks. This project focuses on intelligent resource allocation, distributed learning, and network optimization for ultra-reliable low-latency communications.

title: Autonomous Driving with Edge-Cloud Collaboration
content: Building a comprehensive framework for connected autonomous vehicles leveraging edge computing and cloud intelligence. The project addresses real-time perception, decision-making, and vehicle-to-everything (V2X) communication.

title: Privacy-Preserving Federated Learning at Edge
content: Investigating secure and efficient federated learning algorithms for distributed edge devices. The project develops new techniques for differential privacy, secure aggregation, and communication-efficient distributed training.

title: AI-Driven Network Security
content: Developing machine learning-based security solutions for edge networks and IoT systems. The project focuses on anomaly detection, intrusion prevention, and adversarial defense mechanisms.

title: Swarm Intelligence for Multi-Robot Systems
content: Researching coordinated control and communication algorithms for multi-robot systems operating in dynamic environments. Applications include search and rescue, environmental monitoring, and warehouse automation.

title: Edge Computing for Smart Healthcare
content: Developing edge AI solutions for real-time health monitoring and medical diagnosis. The project focuses on wearable devices, remote patient monitoring, and privacy-preserving health data analysis.
